TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is used to verify a digital signature made with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter> to create digital signatures with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A> method to verify a signature.
[!CODE [System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeFormatterExample#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.cryptography.rsapkcs1signaturedeformatterexample#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter"> class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetKey%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the key and hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm key) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> that holds the public key.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter"> class with the specified key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetHashAlgorithm(string strName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the hash algorithm to use for verifying the signature.
Docs.summary: Sets the hash algorithm to use for verifying the signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You must set a hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetKey(class System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm key) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> that holds the public key.
Docs.summary: Sets the public key to use for verifying the signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You must set a key before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool VerifySignature (byte[] rgbHash, byte[] rgbSignature);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool VerifySignature(unsigned int8[] rgbHash, unsigned int8[] rgbSignature) cil managed

Docs.param: The signature to be verified for .
Docs.summary: Verifies the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> PKCS#1 signature for the specified data.
Docs.returns: `true` if matches the signature computed using the specified hash algorithm and key on ; otherwise, `false`.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You must specify a key and a hash algorithm before calling this method.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to use the VerifySignature method to verify a signature.
[!CODE [System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeFormatterExample#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.security.cryptography.rsapkcs1signaturedeformatterexample#1)]
